text: Yeljan Shinar (;() born 6 June 1999) is a Chinese-Kazakh footballer currently playing as a defender for Beijing BSU. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Shenzhen |2019 |Chinese Super League |12||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||12||0 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total !12!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!12!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese people of Kazakhstani descent Category:Chinese footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Shenzhen F.C. players Category:Beijing BSU F.C. players Category:China League One players Category:Chinese Super League players Category:Footballers from Shanghai
